name: Steam Chain
storyline: In a post war scenario, the world is split into two factions. Chrono Steel, who mostly comprise coal miners and forgers, and Aero Gear, who rule from the skies with their iron grasp. Fae, a young forger, suddenly faces the impending sickness of her mother, and the only way to cure her is by getting her hands on a material known as UnderTech, only produced in Aero Gear. Without skipping a beat, Fae gets ready to cross into AeroGear territory, in the vain hope of finding a cure to save her mother.
summary: Like Super Meat Boy, but you play as a wanna-be engineer! Face perilous hardships and solve mind-bending puzzles, all with the end goal of freeing the city of Chrono Steel. Explore a unique steampunk world while collecting and solving puzzles with gears. Explore you movement arsenal that includes creating platforms and spinning on crazy cogwheels!
